name: LCIMedia
overview:
LCIMedia is a publishing tool for bringing paper magazines and digital content to tablet and mobile readers regardless of readers preferred platform.

Today, the addition of tablet and mobile publishing is becoming increasingly important and the most serious limitation facing journalists and publishers today is that each of those tablet and touch devices features unique display resolutions and functionality, especially small publishers- are facing with the dilemma of how to create and manage text, video and image content for each of these different hardware devices without breaking the bank and certainly now more than ever the publishing industry needs to face one key question: “how to survive free market economy”.

LCIMedia truly believes the future for successful publishing business will rely upon the “SPEED”, “AUTHENTICITY” and “FLAIR” and importantly having a tablet version of your publication is not the end game in publishing business anymore, this is simply the entry point into the sales funnel. The end game is then to create lasting value proposition within your reader communities. This can be achieved if you know: “What they like?” and “why they like it?”
